sentences.en: A step - down transformer has a turns ratio less than 1.
sentences.cn: 降压变压器 的匝数比小于1.

sentences.en: Advanced Transformer fastening structure, the ability to short - circuit resistance.
sentences.cn: 变压器紧固结构先进, 抗短路能力强.

sentences.en: At high input impedances, in practice both efficiency and bandwidth of a transformer will reduce.
sentences.cn: 实际上高输入阻抗的变压器，它们的效率和频带宽度都会下降。

sentences.en: By using a transformer, he translated the codes into translation he could read.
sentences.cn: 通过运用一个变压器，他将密码翻译成他读得懂的译文。

sentences.en: Caution: the soldering iron transformer is designed for short burst operation.
sentences.cn: 警告: 烙铁变压器是专为短期爆裂的运作.

sentences.en: Fig. 9 shows schematically the application of a differential transformer to measurement of liquid column height.
sentences.cn: 应用差动变压器测定液柱高度大致如图9所示.

sentences.en: Figure 50 shows the recommended dc return for a transformer - coupled input.
sentences.cn: 图50示出了输入端变压器耦合的直流回路.

sentences.en: Header between oil conservator and transformer oil tank should be smooth.
sentences.cn: 3储油柜与变压器油箱之间的联管应畅通.

sentences.en: Held by the bluff and the transformer walls, the high point rests 10 feet above the street corner and 13 feet above the lower park.
sentences.cn: 由于有峭壁和变压器墙，山丘的最高点至少高出了街道10英尺并且比整个公园的最低点高了13英尺。

sentences.en: HU Jing - sheng . Transformer Economic Operation. Beijing: China Power Press, 1999.
sentences.cn: 胡景生. 变压器经济运行. 北京: 中国电力出版社, 1999.

sentences.en: In addition, the trend of the power transformer noise control is prospected.
sentences.cn: 最后, 对变压器噪声控制的发展趋势提出了一些看法.

sentences.en: It is very complicated to model transformer in transient calculation.
sentences.cn: 在电磁暂态计算中,变压器是较难模拟的元件之一.

sentences.en: Its moving iron core transformer structure is most widely used.
sentences.cn: 动铁芯式变压器结构,应用最广.

sentences.en: Open tender for purchasing power transformer.
sentences.cn: 公开招标购买电力运输设备.

sentences.en: The substation equipped with a transformer of 500 KVA is at the south of the plant.
sentences.cn: 在工程的南边有一座装有五百千伏安变电器的变电站.

sentences.en: The transformer isolates the transistors with regard to d - c bias voltage .
sentences.cn: 变压器可在两个晶体管之间隔离直流 偏压.

sentences.en: The transformer substation survived the blast with relatively minor damage to the essential components.
sentences.cn: 经爆震波袭击后未被毁坏的变电站的重要组件受到较小的损坏.

sentences.en: There is a transformer in there.

words.tran_cn: 可变化的；可变形的；可转化的

电压互感器；电压变量器

trans.tran_cn: 变压器，促使变化的（或人物），改革者
